Header.title: Internity
Header.paragraph: Instructors led training programs to build basic skills.

About.paragraph: Instructors led training programs to build basic skills. This program will enable students to start their learning journey with technology.
Why: Data Science with Python for Beginners
Prepare for AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner Certification CLF-C01
Why2: Basics of Cloud Computing and Cloud Native development using AWS
Machine Learning with Python for Beginners
